text: Meet the Detroit Tiger: Grayson Greiner Detroit Tigers catcher prospect Grayson Greiner busted his finger in his first big-league camp. Post to Facebook Meet the Detroit Tiger: Grayson Greiner Detroit Tigers catcher prospect Grayson Greiner busted his finger in his first big-league camp.   Freep.com: http://on.freep.com/2m5lM9e   Join the Conversation   Meet the Detroit Tiger: Grayson Greiner Jeff Seidel , Detroit Free Press Columnist Published 3:55 p.m. ET Feb. 21, 2017 | Updated 58 minutes ago Facebook Posted!
